title: Question about DJ Sona volume controlle
body: How do you adjust the volume in her music will it be counted as music in game so I turn down the music volume or will it be counted as a character voice/volume or  will it have a custom way of changing the volume

replies.body: Here's to hoping they balance the volume of hers well relative to the volume of the rift music.
Most likely it will be counted as music. So I'm going to need to adjust my in game music everytime I see a Sona or play her myself. {{champion:37}} DJ HYPE!
